code: import{DataContext}from"./DataContext";import{useRef,useContext}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LedsInput=()=>{const{dataToSend,setDataToSend}=useContext(DataContext);const textRef=useRef();const colorRef=useRef();const updateMessage=(x,y)=>{setDataToSend(prev=>({...prev,text:x,color:y}));};const butonHandle=e=>{updateMessage(textRef.current.value,colorRef.current.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"led-div-input   ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:"PUT Powertrain",ref:textRef,className:"led-text-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"led-color-and-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"color",defaultValue:"#0000ff",ref:colorRef,className:"led-color-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"save-color-input-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"button",className:"save-color-input",value:"SAVE",onClick:butonHandle})})]})]});};export default LedsInput;
